title: Rp cards problem
body: I recently bought 8 rp cards (ik im greedy) and I got 6 of them redeemed then this message shows up " You have exceeded the maximum number of code redemption attempts at this time. Please wait and try again later" and today I tried it again after 12 hours. DO i need to wait another 24 hour or just 12 hours?

replies.body: Hit us up in a [support ticket](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/requests/new) so our billing team can help out.  The limit usually shows up in some cases like multiple attempts and generally a security precaution.  You may need to wait a full 24 hours, but you can also reach out to us to make sure.  Let me know if that clears things up!
